I am trying to add the ability for OpenCPN to act as a WMS server.

got a couple of questions, hope someone has time to point me in the right direction.

Is there a way to probe / get notified when the rendering is completed? I get some partially drawn charts and also some crashes when I am too aggressive (cross thread abuse perhaps).

Do I need cross thread protection so that the rendering mechanism is only handled by the main UI thread? And if so, is there a good place look in OpenCPN?

What is needed to make the ChartCanvas make nice chart decisions, I seem to keep getting messed up charts.

Cheers
